data.title: Career and Technical Education Certificate Titles:Certfiication:OTI:NYSED
data.text:
Career and Technical Education Certificate Titles

The following CTE certificate titles are categorized by the national Career Clusters .

The certificate requirements for each title are available at Search Certification Requirements and the occupational work experience descriptions for each title are available on the Career and Technical Education Experience Requirements webpage.

Agriculture, Food & Natural Resources

Agricultural Engineering and Mechanics

Agricultural Production, Science, and Business (formerly the Animal Production, Science, and Business certificate title)
